data.persona: I work at the village school. I teach all the children from the ages of 3 to 13. Without me they wouldn't receive a decent education. I am very important in my village.
data.description:
You are in the Pharmacy.
The pharmacy is a state of the art building, much different from every other building in town. it attracts many people of all types, as they are drawn to the unique style and class of the building. It is painted a bright red and covered in black crosses indicating it is a health center in some capacity
The doctor is here.

You are carrying nothing, and wearing a dress.

data.short_motivation: I need to get herbs from the doctor
data.long_motivation: I cannot teach in this condition and must be healthy because classes are beginning soon
